DOC.brief_title: Effects Zumba Dance Program Postmenopausal Women With Metabolic Syndrome
DOC.criteria: postmenopausal woman ( Age 4565 ) waist > 94 cm BMI > 30kg/m2 physically active > 1x/week 20 minute write consent start study involvement clinical study unable participate dance lesson medical contraindication intervention increase risk exercise participation
